pages.text: $(l)Svartalfheim Steel Tools$() are renowned for their reliability, durability, and magical potency, enabling feats that ordinary tools cannot achieve. $(br2)A pickaxe forged from $(l:resources/svartalfheim_steel)Svartalfheim Steel$(), for instance, possesses magical properties that allow it to mine $(l:resources/asgardian_steel)Asgardian Steel Ore$() â€” an endeavor impossible for tools made from any other material. $(br2)A sword forged from $(l:resources/svartalfheim_steel)Svartalfheim Steel$(), while not as strong as other legendary weapons, allows for rapid strikes due to the material's lightness.
Though it is doubtful that one would need the last two.
